record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON CALENDAR

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 6 is at the desk and is due for a second reading.

record.chair: The leader is correct. The clerk will read the bill for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now object to any further proceedings at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
